version_description:
With this update we have improved the download for offline maps and made several optimizations.
Thank you very much for your feedback! In case of problems with the swisstopo app, please contact the support by email (support-cd@swisstopo.ch) or phone (+41 58 469 02 22).

Adjustments to the subscription menu due to the introduction of Open Government Data (OGD) on 1.3.2021.

You have questions or feedback? Contact us by e-mail (support-cd@swisstopo.ch) or phone (+41 58 469 02 22).

New free and unrestricted data storage possible thanks to the introduction of Open Government Data (OGD) at swisstopo as of 1.3.2021. Various optimisations.
You have questions or feedback? Contact us by e-mail (support-cd@swisstopo.ch) or phone (+41 58 469 02 22).

Free and unrestricted data storage possible thanks to the introduction of Open Government Data (OGD) at swisstopo. Improvement in updating air navigation obstacles.
You have questions or feedback? Contact us by e-mail (support-cd@swisstopo.ch) or phone (+41 58 469 02 22).

New with hiking tour guide, closed hiking trails and the possibility to invert a tour as well as various optimisations.

You have questions or feedback? Contact us by e-mail (support-cd@swisstopo.ch) or phone (+41 58 469 02 22).

This version contains various optimizations.
Thank you very much for your feedback! In case of problems with the swisstopo app, please contact the support by email (support-cd@swisstopo.ch) or phone (+41 58 469 02 22).
